page.title: 20OUR SURVEY TEAM
page.content: The work contained in this survey formed part of a term's project on our environment. The project was conducted by all the children of Class 1, Crow Orchard County Primary School under the guidance of their class teacher Mr. G. Cooke and the headmaster Mr. P. A.Caine during June and July 1985. Written contributions were made by: Amanda McManus David Peel Kerry Wilson Andrew Duffy Christine Crompton Jamie Dolan Chey Cummings Steven Mitchell Nicola Williams Chris Gray Sandra Wadkin Darren Rothwell All these children were aged 10 to 11 years at the time of the project. They have all lived in the town for the major part of their lives.All the families had originally moved here from Liverpool seeking employment in the New Town.
